scripts.build: pnpm run clean:buildinfo && turbo run build
scripts.beautify: pnpm run format && pnpm run eslint:fix
scripts.release:canary: RELEASE_TYPE=canary pnpm run version && RELEASE_TYPE=canary pnpm run publish
scripts.release:stable: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
scripts.release:major: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version major && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
scripts.release:minor: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version minor && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
scripts.release:patch: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version patch && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
